titleInfo.title: Graham et al v. Bank of America N.A.
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER GRANTING DEFENDANT'S MOTION TO DISMISS 15. Signed by Judge BARRY M. KURREN on 3/29/2012. ~ Defendant's Motion to Dismiss is GRANTED, and Plaintiffs are given until April 30, 2012 to amend their complaint with respect to their TILA and UDAP claims. (ecs, )CERTIFICATE OF SERVICEParticipants registered to receive electronic notifications received this document electronically at the e-mail address listed on the Notice of Electronic Filing (NEF). Participants not registered to receive electronic notifications were served by first class mail on the date of this docket entry
